item.title: Use your own domain name for GitHub Pages
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: To point your own domain name like one from GoDaddy, Spaceship, or Webhostingpad to a GitHub Pages site, you need to use the A records in DNS settings. Specifically, you need to configure the DNS settings with the domain registrar (GoDaddy, Webhostingpad, etc.) and update your GitHub Pages settings. You will need to create A records, i.e., Address Records, pointing to the GitHub Pages IP addresses and verify the custom domain in GitHub.
